pages.text: Before being able to apply Jewels to a Vault Tool, it needs to be crafted.$(br2)They can be crafted $(l)at or below$() the player's level.$(br2)Crafted Jewels have $(l)slightly decreased$() odds in comparison to Jewels found within Vaults.
Both Vault Tools and Jewels are both crafted in the $(l)Tool Station$().$(br2)The $(l)base type$() and $(l)tier$() is determined by the player upon crafting the Vault Tool.
